citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:24 am on
04-Sep-19.
Arrived at facility gate closed and locked. Attempt to contact by phone and left message. Left business card on the
gate. Departed facility at 10:55 am.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:24 am on
04-Sep-19.
Arrived at facility gate closed and locked.  Attempt to contact by phone and left message.  Left business card on the
gate.  Departed facility at 10:55 am.
